channel.title: Global objects (all) not working!?
channel.description: Ok, so, I was messin with my objects, and all of a sudden, they stop working. I don't know what I did wrong. There are no errors now, but they just wont work. Can someone help?

item.title: Global objects (all) not working!?
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

void public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { // Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if (p != null) {
client person = (client) p;

            if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) {
                if (person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60) {
                    person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation,
                            tileObjectType);
                }
            }
        }
    }




public void NewObjects() {

makeGlobalObject(2978, 3594, 2213, 0, 10); //Clan wars bank
}

Read full topic
